title: Large Apartment
p1: The spacious attic apartment features two bedrooms, a triple and a double. The living room is dominated by a traditional wood-burning tiled stove, a large sofa (2 extra beds), and a TV with satellite reception. The fully equipped kitchen with a cooking island, oven, dishwasher, and ample storage space offers plenty of room for communal cooking. Additional kitchen amenities include a kettle, glass-ceramic hob, fridge with freezer, cookware, and a dining set from our own ceramic workshop. A large dining table with a corner bench and chairs adjoins the kitchen area.
p2: The bathroom is fitted with a built-in sink and a bathtub. The toilet is separate.
p3: The two bedrooms are interconnected. The first bedroom features a double bed and a single bed, while the second has two single beds, which can be combined into another double bed. Both bedrooms offer ample storage space.
p4: A baby crib is available upon request.
p5: The entire apartment is furnished with wooden furniture in a simple country style. Most windows face southeast, offering views of the local church and the Březná River flowing through the valley.

pricelist.p3: Recreational fee in the Červená Voda municipality per night for persons over 18 years old.

rezervationText.p1: Upon a binding order, we will issue an invoice for bank transfer.
rezervationText.p2: If you are unable to check in due to personal reasons, we will refund 70% of the invoiced amount.
rezervationText.p3: If the stay is canceled due to government regulations, we will refund the full invoiced amount.
